name: Heroic Fortune
components: V, S, DF, M (diamond dust worth 100 gp)
text: This spell grants 1 hero point to the target. This hero point must be spent before the duration expires, or it is lost. The bonus hero point is spent before any other hero points the target might possess.
components_zh: 语言，姿势，法器，材料（价值100gp的钻石尘）
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh: 此法术给予目标1点临时英雄点，在其它英雄点前使用，到期发散。
